BACK

jQuery experiments: Nested Accordion - demo 1

Accordion 3 can be used for site navigation. The sub-list with the anchor whose target matches the current location and the sub-list under it (if any) are initially expanded. To see it in action, click one of the items with same-page link and then reload the page. (All the items under Item 1 have same-page links.)

Main content

Accordion 1 - Nested Lists + Headings + DIVs

Activated whenever a 'click' event occurs. The first sub-section is expanded when the page loads.
